title: Sheath, ca. 1680
markings: On cap of sheath: KB A
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Tapered sheath, light purple enamel with multi-colored floral and scrolled pattern. On each side three flowers and two male busts in relief; profile with a wreath of laurels. Silver mount and cap. Cap engraved on each side with two crossed swords.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sheath, ca. 1680.
ca. 1680. silver, enamel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-63-a.
